Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute at Sedgwick/North Avenue
ShortDescription: 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Sedgwick, Division, Wells, North Avenue, and Sedgwick due to, street blockage near Sedgwick/North Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sedgwick, Division, Wells, North Avenue, and Sedgwick, due to street blockage near Sedgwick/North Avenue.

Allow extra travel time.
